liber.edit.client
Class Hierarchy

java.lang.Object
  liber.edit.client.Hierarchy

public class Hierarchy
extends Object

Contains a class hierarchy, with class names and their natural language expressions.

Version:
1.0 May 2007
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
